statement.p: In 23.26 of the last 43 days it rained. How many days did it not rain? days

solution.p: We recall that a percent as a decimal is part/whole. Here that is \displaystyle\frac{{P}}{{43}}={0.2326}. We solve for P by multiplying by \displaystyle{43}. \displaystyle{P}={0.2326}\cdot{43}={10.0018}. This is the number of days that it rained. We want the non-rainy days which is 43-10.0018=32.9982 We round that as requested to 33.
